name: Spud Souls
description:
This is a silly platformer I made in my high school game design class a couple of years ago. It has a lot of inside jokes from previous games I made during that class so things that seem out of place are just jokes you don't get (unfortunately). Obviously this is a parody of Dark Souls (one of my favorite games). This was made In Game Maker 8.1 Lite as you will see with the annoying watermark. I hope you enjoy this short souls-like platformer! 

Controls:

Right/Left Arrow = Move

Up Arrow = Jump

Z = Attack

X = Roll

There are some secrets in this game too...
